fields.name: **🕒 Timers**
fields.value:
• **Add**: Manage automated message timers. Add a new timer. ⏰
• **Remove**: Manage automated message timers. Remove an existing timer. ❌
• **List**: Manage automated message timers. List all active timers. 📋
• **Set**: Manage automated message timers. Set/update an existing timer. 🔄

fields.name: **📺 YouTube**
fields.value:
• **Add**: Add, remove, or set the notification channel for YouTube. Add a YouTube channel. ➕
• **Remove**: Add, remove, or set the notification channel for YouTube. Remove a YouTube channel. ❌
• **Set**: Add, remove, or set the notification channel for YouTube. Set the notification channel for YouTube. 🔔
• **List**: Add, remove, or set the notification channel for YouTube. List monitored YouTube channels. 📋

fields.name: **📺 Twitch**
fields.value:
• **Add**: Add, remove, or set the notification channel for Twitch. Add a Twitch channel. ➕
• **Remove**: Add, remove, or set the notification channel for Twitch. Remove a Twitch channel. ❌
• **Set**: Add, remove, or set the notification channel for Twitch. Set the notification channel for Twitch. 🔔
• **List**: Add, remove, or set the notification channel for Twitch. List monitored Twitch channels. 📋

fields.name: **🎵 Music**
fields.value:
• **Play** (aliases: p, ▶️): Play a selected song from YouTube 🎶
• **Pause**: Pause the currently playing song ⏸️
• **Resume** (aliases: r, ▶️): Resume playing with the Discord bot ▶️
• **Skip** (aliases: s, ⏭️): Skip to the next song ⏭️
• **Queue** (aliases: q, 📜): Display currently queued songs 📜
• **Clear Queue** (aliases: c, bin, 🗑️): Stop the music and clear the queue 🗑️
• **Stop** (aliases: disconnect, l, d, 🛑): Disconnect the bot from the voice channel 🛑
• **Remove**: Remove the last song added to the queue ❌
